problem: Develop the ZMusic Discord Bot as specified in the project brief and memory bank documents.
context: The bot requires integration of discord.py, yt-dlp, ffmpeg, asynchronous programming, persistent storage, interactive UI (discord.ui), dual command interfaces (prefix/slash), and various features like playback, queue management, effects, video sharing, permissions, etc. Modularity via Cogs is planned. See memory-bank/ files for full details.
